response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item that could potentially save you thousands over its retail value. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 9500}
